email_body:
Dear Sir / Madam,

The Housing & Development Board (“HDB”) invites your company to participate
in the following Invitation to Tender:

------------------------------

1. Tender Information

-

Title:

BUILDING WORKS AT PROJECT SKYVIEW (YISHUN NEIGHBOURHOOD 8)
-

Reference No.:

HDB000ETT25000023 / PCG-TN250018
-

Agency:

Housing & Development Board, Building & Estate Division
-

Description:

Proposed construction of residential blocks, multi-storey car park,
precinct pavilions and ancillary works at Yishun Neighbourhood 8, including
external works, services and associated contingency items.
-

Location of Works:

Junction of Yishun Avenue 8 and Yishun Street 51, Singapore

------------------------------

2. Eligibility & Registration

Tenderers should note the following eligibility requirements:

-

Registered with BCA under CW01 – General Building, Grade B2 and above, or

CW02 – Civil Engineering, Grade C1 and above, at the point of tender
submission.
-

Not currently debarred from public sector tenders in Singapore.
-

Able to comply with Public Sector Standard Conditions of Contract
(PSSCOC) for Building Works (latest edition).

Documentary proof of registration and any relevant certifications (e.g.
ISO, BizSAFE) shall be submitted as part of the tender offer.

------------------------------

3. Tender Documents

The tender documents are issued as follows and attached to this email:

1.

Volume 1 – Instructions to Tenderers & Form of Tender (Vol1_ITT_FoT.pdf)

2.

Volume 2 – Conditions of Contract (PSSCOC-based)
(Vol2_PSSCOC_Conditions.pdf)

3.

Volume 3 – Specifications (Vol3_Specifications.pdf)

4.

Volume 4 – Drawings (Architectural & Structural) (Vol4_Drawings.zip)

5.

Volume 5 – Bills of Quantities (BOQ) (Vol5_BOQ.xlsx)

6.

Additional / Technical Conditions of Tender
(ACOT_Technical_YishunN8.pdf)

Tenderers are advised to carefully review all volumes and appendices,
including the Additional Conditions of Tender and any technical
requirements specific to this site.

------------------------------

4. Site Show-Round (Optional)

A non-compulsory site briefing and show-round will be conducted as follows:

-

Date: 22 November 2025
-

Time: 10:00 am (Singapore Time)
-

Meeting Point: Open space near Blk 888 Yishun Avenue 8

Tenderers who wish to attend are requested to register their company name,
participant names and contact details via email to hdb_project_skyview@hdb.gov.sg by 20 November 2025, 12:00 pm.

------------------------------

5. Submission Deadline & Validity

-

Tender Closing Date & Time:

06 January 2026, 4:00 pm (Singapore Time)
-

Tender Offer Validity:

Your offer shall remain valid for three (3) months from the closing
date, or as otherwise extended in accordance with the Instructions to
Tenderers.

Tender submissions must be lodged electronically via GeBIZ using the
prescribed Form of Tender in Volume 1, together with all supporting
documents as indicated in the checklist. Late submissions will not be
considered.

------------------------------

6. Clarifications & Addenda

All requests for clarification shall be submitted via GeBIZ no later than
14 days before the tender closing date. HDB may issue addenda or
clarifications to all registered tenderers; these will be published through
GeBIZ and/or sent to the email used for registration.

Tenderers are responsible for ensuring that all addenda and revised
documents are acknowledged and taken into account in their tender offers.

------------------------------

7. Key Compliance Items (Non-Exhaustive)

Tenderers’ attention is drawn in particular to the following:

-

Submission of BCA registration certificate matching the required
workhead and grade.
-

Evidence of similar past projects of comparable scale and complexity
within the last five (5) years, including contract values and completion
status.
-

Proposed project team, including a qualified Project Manager, Resident
Engineer and Site Supervisor with relevant local experience.
-

Compliance with:

-

Workplace Safety and Health (WSH) requirements
-

HDB’s prevailing technical specifications
-

Environmental and noise control regulations

Full details are contained within the tender documents.

------------------------------

8. Contact Information

For administrative matters relating to tender access and submission, please
contact:

-

HDB Tender Administration

Email: hdb_tender_admin@hdb.gov.sg

Tel: +65 6490 2084

For technical clarifications, please submit queries via GeBIZ as specified
in the Instructions to Tenderers.

------------------------------

Yours faithfully,

TENDER ADMINISTRATION UNIT

Building & Estate Division

Housing & Development Board

480 Lorong 6 Toa Payoh

Singapore 310480

email_subject: INVITATION TO TENDER – BUILDING WORKS AT PROJECT SKYVIEW (YISHUN NEIGHBOURHOOD 8)

email_body:
Dear Sir / Madam,

Please note the issuance of *Addendum No. 2* for the following tender:

*Tender Title:*
*BUILDING WORKS AT PROJECT SKYVIEW (YISHUN NEIGHBOURHOOD 8)*

*Tender Reference:*
*HDB000ETT25000023 / PCG-TN250018*

This addendum forms part of the Tender Documents and shall be read in
conjunction with the original set of documents issued on *14 November 2025*
and *Addendum No. 1 issued on 18 November 2025*.

*1. Clarifications to Tender Documents*

The following clarifications have been issued based on queries received
from tenderers:

*1.1 Clarification on Structural Works Specifications*

Tenderers are to note that under *Volume 2 – Technical Specifications,
Section 3B (Reinforced Concrete Works)*, Clause 3B-4.2 “Steel
Reinforcement” is to be amended as follows:

- *“All steel reinforcement for columns and shear walls shall be Grade
B500B”*
*replaces*
*“All steel reinforcement for columns and shear walls shall be Grade
B500A.”*

*1.2 Clarification on Precast Elements*

The precast façade panels indicated in Drawing *A-341 to A-355* are to be
revised to reflect the updated anchorage details as tabulated below:

*Drawing No.*

*Original Detail*

*Revised Detail*

A-342

Welded angle plate anchorage

Mechanical anchor system with M16 SS316 bolts

A-347

Bottom support plate thickness 10mm

Bottom support plate thickness 12mm

Tenderers must incorporate these revised details in their pricing.

*2. Replacement of Documents*

The following document(s) issued previously are hereby *superseded* by the
revised versions *included below within this email*:

*2.1 Replacement BOQ Pages*

The following pages of the Bill of Quantities are replaced:

- BOQ *Section B – Architectural Works*
Pages *B-34 to B-38*

*3. Updated Drawing Amendments (Text Version)*

Due to system access constraints, the updated drawing amendments are
summarised below:

*3.1 Drawing C-212 – Drainage Plan (Basement 1)*

- Floor trap FT-B1-23 relocated 450mm north to avoid structural beam.
- Rainwater downpipe RDP-B1-11 reduced from Ø150mm to Ø125mm due to
updated flow calculations.

*3.2 Drawing E-105 – Lighting Layout (Level 2)*

- Additional emergency lighting provided at Lift Lobby 02.
- Exit sign relocated to comply with updated FSSD requirements.

*(This text serves as a formal amendment to the drawings.)*

*4. Extension of Closing Date*

Please be informed that the *tender closing date is extended* as follows:

- *Original Closing Date:* 28 November 2025 (4:00 PM)
- *Revised Closing Date:* *3 December 2025 (4:00 PM)*

Tenderers must acknowledge this extension in their Form of Tender.

*5. Confirmation of Receipt*

All tenderers *must acknowledge receipt of Addendum No. 2* by replying to
this email with:

“We acknowledge receipt of Addendum No. 2 for Tender Ref:
HDB000ETT25000023.”

Failure to acknowledge may result in disqualification.

*6. Contact for Clarifications*

For further clarifications, please email:

*B&E Contracts Unit*
Housing & Development Board
Email: *tenders@hdb.gov.sg *
Quote: *“Yishun N8 – Addendum 2”* in subject line.

Thank you.

*Housing & Development Board*
*Building & Estate Division*
Singapore
email_subject: Addendum No. 2 – BUILDING WORKS AT PROJECT SKYVIEW (YISHUN NEIGHBOURHOOD 8), Tender Ref: HDB000ETT25000023 / PCG-TN250018
